entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Resolute
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:25 AM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -34.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Resolute Airport 12:00 PM CST Friday 17 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -34.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -41
Dewpoint: -38.5°C
Wind: NNW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 33.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 33. Wind chill near minus 48. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 40.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 40. Wind chill minus 48 this evening and minus 56 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 33.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind north 30 km/h. High minus 33. Wind chill minus 56 in the morning and minus 50 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 17 February 2023
